review.title: “Great if you need a fun job while studying”
review.pros: Pros – If you're looking for a light hearted job with good pay considering it's retail this is a top choice.
review.cons: Cons – Progression into leadership roles are mainly subjected to who you know in management roles or suck up to, rather than credentials.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Treat everyone the same and you will see more productivity.

review.title: “OK”
review.pros: Pros – Good salary & benefits at all levels, bonuses can be generous. Paid weekly. Lively sales floor environment, good location.
review.cons: Cons – "Cronyism" and blame culture in senior management.Poor communication, competition encouraged over teamwork.Poor performers aren't dealt with, personality valued over contribution.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Lead by example. Managers should practise what they preach with five principles and ways of working.

review.title: “M&M World London not what you think”
review.pros: Pros – Salary, Benifits, American Management, size
review.cons: Cons – Lazy Upper Management, Favouritism, do not follow the 5 principles that that they preach, Bad atmosphere, backstabbing, if the management dont like you they make you life hell untill you leave or they find a way to fire you.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – support everyone not just your favourites
